name: @context-guardian/ast-analyzer
description: AST-based pattern detection for Context Guardian using Tree-sitter

scripts.example: node -e "const { ASTAnalyzer } = require('./dist/index'); const path = require('path'); const analyzer = new ASTAnalyzer(); analyzer.analyzeProject({ rootDir: path.resolve(__dirname, 'examples/sample-react-project/src'), extensions: ['.js', '.jsx', '.ts', '.tsx'], excludeDirs: ['node_modules'], maxFiles: 100 }).then(p => { console.log('State Management:', p.stateManagement); console.log('Component Style:', p.componentStyle); console.log('Frameworks:', p.frameworks); console.log('Uses Hooks:', p.patterns.usesHooks); console.log('Uses TypeScript:', p.patterns.usesTypeScript); });"

author: Context Guardian
